reviewText: Excellent material u WON'T learn in school!!
Yes. Very well presented. I enjoyed it very much and look forward to sharing it with others

I am pleased.
Here is the million dollar question: are you going to heaven if you die today?
How To Know That You Will Go To Heaven When You Die:
[...]
Anyone questioning the origins of "race" should definitely purchase the book or dvd. No doubt about it we are all of the same race--the human race. Wow--A real eye-opener.
Ken Ham is one of the most credible and reasonable Christian leaders.  He utilizes science, Scripture, logic, etc., to simply state what is really true about our world.  Thank God for such men.

This is among the best resources I've evaluated to date that provides solid evidence that the Bible and modern-day science/genetics agree...powerful evidence that the unproven philosophy of evolution is foundationally wrong regarding the origins of people groups. An OUTSTANDING, fact-filled, verifiable and fun presentation by Ken Ham... highly recommended for personal use as well as group viewing.
